title: Diathesis stress supports statement about disorder

content.prompt: The diathesis-stress approach would likely support which of the following statements about psychological disorders?

choices.label: Disorders are a result of the social and economic situations in which people live.
Disorders are a result of unresolved, unconscious conflicts between the id and the superego.
Disorders are a result of negative events that trigger irrational thoughts.
Disorders are a result of predisposed, biological factors triggered by the environment.

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
